nde2.pull.methodcalls

Class BaseMethodCall

  • java.lang.Object
    • nde2.pull.methodcalls.BaseMethodCall
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeliveryMethodCall, DiscoveryMethodCall

    public abstract class BaseMethodCall
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the most basic methods to fetch XML response documents from ONS and wrap them inside of a parser object. Also handles caching.

    Note that I said XML. It is actually a SOAP response document, but the way I'm using it later in the data flow, it may as well be regular XML. SOAP doesn't make much sense.

    Author:
    filip

      • buildURLString

        protected java.lang.String buildURLString(java.lang.String endpoint,
                              java.lang.String method,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
        URL-encodes the parameters
        Parameters:
        endpoint - the endpoint to call
        method - the method to call
        params - a dictionary of parameter names and their values
        Returns:
        an URL string to call the given method on the given endpoint with the given parameters.

      • execute

        protected abstract XmlPullParser execute(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         XmlPullParserException
        Defines the execution plan of a call. Usually, this means plugging in a remote method name and the params into the other doCall(), however it can be used for anything, such as checking some parameters and then deciding to use a different call altogether, because the other one is utterly broken for given inputs. (Looking at you, FindAreas)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        XmlPullParserException
        Parameters:
        params - a dictionary of parameter names and their values
        Returns:
        An XmlPullParser primed with the response document.

      • collectParams

        protected abstract java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> collectParams()
        Children objects will use this method to collect their parameters for the call.
        Returns:
        A map of the parameters.

        public abstract java.lang.String toURLString()
